name: Indirection (itch) (Jake)
description:
Description:

Indirection is a platforming game with a twist - you can only move in one direction! Make use of the massive Aperture-esque facility to get your way to the exit!

Controls:

Left and Right arrow keys - Move forward

Up Arrow - Jump

F11 - Full Screen

More:

Get the full game for more levels, infinite community maps, a level editor, and the latest updates!
